resources.string: We need the front side of your Driver’s \nLicense photograph to verify your identity

Place the document on a flat surface, make 
sure the frame covers the whole document 
and the image is not blurry, dark or bright 
and then press the shutter
Guide to taking Driver’s License photo
The document is original and still valid
Do not use edited, unoriginal documents
The document is not cut corners, punched and contains strange objects inside
The document is not blurred, dark or bright
We need the back side of your Driver’s \nLicense photograph to verify your identity

Place the document on a flat surface, make 
sure the frame covers the whole document 
and the image is not blurry, dark or bright and 
then press the shutter
We need the portrait with phone number of your \nDriver’s License photograph to verify your identity
Position your whole face in the frame without mask and follow the guideline
Next step move your face slowly to the right \nand back
Then move your face slowly to the left \nand back
There is an unverified image, if you choose \nto continue you must wait 15 - 30 minutes \nfor check by support team.
Thank you. Your face has been recorded \nsuccessfully!
Face recognition not possible, if you choose \nto continue you must wait 15 - 30 minutes \nfor check by support team.
